item.text: So Isaac called for Jacob and blessed him. Then he commanded him, “You must not marry a Canaanite woman!

<st data-num="01980" class="">Leave</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">immediately</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="06307" class="">Paddan Aram</st>! Go to the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="01328" class="">Bethuel</st>, your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, and <st data-num="03947" class="">find</st> yourself a <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>, among the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> of <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st>, your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother’s</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>.

May the <st data-num="07706" class="">Sovereign</st> <st data-num="0410" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01288" class="">bless</st> you! May he <st data-num="06509" class="">make</st> you <st data-num="06509" class="">fruitful</st> and <st data-num="07235" class="">give</st> you <st data-num="07235" class="">a multitude of descendants</st>!<n id="2" /> Then you will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st><n id="3" /> a <st data-num="06951" class="">large</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">nation</st>.<n id="4" />

May he <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you and your <st data-num="02233 0854">descendants</st> the <st data-num="01293" class="">blessing</st> he gave to <st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st><n id="1" /> so that you may <st data-num="03423" class="">possess</st> the <st data-num="0776 0834">land</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> to <st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st>, the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> where you have been <st data-num="04033" class="">living as a temporary resident</st>.”<n id="3" />
So Isaac sent Jacob on his way, and he went to Paddan Aram, to Laban son of Bethuel the Aramean and brother of Rebekah, the mother of Jacob and Esau.
Esau saw that Isaac had blessed Jacob and sent him off to Paddan Aram to find a wife there. As he blessed him, Isaac commanded him, “You must not marry a Canaanite woman.”

<st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">obeyed</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">and</st> <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">left</st> for <st data-num="06307" class="">Paddan Aram</st>.

Then <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">realized</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaanite</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">women</st><n id="2" /> were <st data-num="07451 05869">displeasing</st> to<n id="3" /> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03327" class="">Isaac</st>.
So Esau went to Ishmael and married Mahalath, the sister of Nebaioth and daughter of Abraham’s son Ishmael, along with the wives he already had.
Meanwhile Jacob left Beer Sheba and set out for Haran.

He <st data-num="06293" class="">reached</st> a certain <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08033" class="">where</st> he decided to <st data-num="03885" class="">camp</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="08121" class="">sun</st> had <st data-num="0935" class="">gone down</st>.<n id="2" /> He <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> one of the <st data-num="068 04725">stones</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="07760" class="">placed</st> it near his <st data-num="04763" class="">head</st>.<n id="4" /> Then <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">fell asleep</st><n id="5" /> in that <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>

and <st data-num="02492" class="">had a dream</st>.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="02009" class="">saw</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="05551" class="">stairway</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05324" class="">erected</st> on the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> with its <st data-num="07218" class="">top</st> <st data-num="05060" class="">reaching</st> to the <st data-num="08064" class="">heavens</st>. The <st data-num="02009 04397">angels</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> were <st data-num="05927" class="">going up</st> and <st data-num="03381" class="">coming down</st> it
and the Lord stood at its top. He said, “I am the Lord, the God of your grandfather Abraham and the God of your father Isaac. I will give you and your descendants the ground you are lying on.

Your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendants</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> like the <st data-num="06083" class="">dust</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>,<n id="1" /> and you will <st data-num="06555" class="">spread out</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>, <st data-num="06924" class="">east</st>, <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>, and <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st>. And so <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> of the <st data-num="0127" class="">earth</st> may <st data-num="01288" class="">receive blessings</st><n id="3" /> through you and through your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendants</st>.
I am with you! I will protect you wherever you go and will bring you back to this land. I will not leave you until I have done what I promised you!”
Then Jacob woke up and thought, “Surely the Lord is in this place, but I did not realize it!”
He was afraid and said, “What an awesome place this is! This is nothing else than the house of God! This is the gate of heaven!”
Early in the morning Jacob took the stone he had placed near his head and set it up as a sacred stone. Then he poured oil on top of it.

He <st data-num="07121 08034">called</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> <st data-num="01008" class="">Bethel</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0199" class="">although</st> the <st data-num="07223" class="">former</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">town</st> was <st data-num="03870" class="">Luz</st>.

Then <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="05087" class="">made</st> a <st data-num="05088" class="">vow</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> <st data-num="05978" class="">with</st> me and <st data-num="08104" class="">protects</st> me on <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01870 0834">journey</st> <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="01980" class="">taking</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">gives</st> me <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> and <st data-num="0899" class="">clothing</st> to <st data-num="03847" class="">wear</st>,
and I return safely to my father’s home, then the Lord will become my God.
Then this stone that I have set up as a sacred stone will be the house of God, and I will surely give you back a tenth of everything you give me.”
